Welcome to Steam, where people voice their opinions and you don't get to hide them. In all seriousness though, don't flame the devs, it's not their fault they have to cope with shitty upper management. I'm sure most of them were thrilled to develop what was promised and got burned just as hard if not even harder than the players. They spent years of their life pouring blood, sweat and tears into code/systems that will now likely never see the light of day.
